description: Packed with colour and bursting with zing-this new take on roast carrots will fill your house with delicious aromas and is the perfect side dish.
keywords: Roast Orange & Cumin Carrots With Couscous & Haloumi Salad
name: Roast Orange & Cumin Carrots With Couscous & Haloumi Salad Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Heat a large non-stick frying pan over medium-high heat. Add haloumi. Cook for 1 minute each side or until browned. Arrange carrot mixture over rocket salad on platter. Top with haloumi. Drizzle with remaining oil mixture. Serve sprinkled with thinly sliced orange zest and remaining pistachio.
